attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see the stoping of payments for secound homes and in stead of this payment get a building built so mps could stay there when thay need to this would save the tax payer untold money and we the tax payer would not have to pay out for nonesntual goods. if it is good enough for ower forses to stay in barrock why can't ower so called leaders

rejection.details: Similar petitions are already on the system - if you search current petitions you will find one to sign.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
